Name: Waifus Smash
About the game: Please wishlist to get news in the future! You wake up one day and receive a letter from the head of the village 'Obihiro '' inviting you to save their village from threat. Deciding to set out on a journey to explore the world, defeat monsters, rescue Waifus and save the village. Features: Exciting rhythm-based combat with enemy and bosses Exciting combination of rock metal, techno and retro music Funny and smart sokoban-style puzzle Animated enemies and cute chibi character Beautiful background and environment Large open region and many dungeon to explore
